parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current state of given [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control. Since Arma 3 v1.71.141591 it is possible to query multiple checkboxes by providing checkbox index. For more information see [[CT_CHECKBOXES]].<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The <tt>"CheckBoxesSelChanged"</tt> control EH returns the control, index of changed checkbox and its current checked state. The checked state however is not a [[Boolean]] but [[Number]] 0 or 1. To convert [[ctrlChecked]] command output into number as well, use [[parseNumber]] command</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlChecked''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control. If control contain multiple checkboxes, only checkbox with index 0 is queried.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] checked, [[false]] unchecked

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''ctrlChecked''' index <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.71.141591</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - checkbox index

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] checked, [[false]] unchecked

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlChecked]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlChecked]] 3;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetChecked]], [[cbChecked]], [[cbSetChecked]]
</value></part></template>
